entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
